text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea The article focuses a lot on comments. It is what I am teaching my kids not to do. The subset of people who feel entitled to comment negatively on your clothes choices, is not more worthy than an other.

author.description: We are sorry, but second order thinking is not available at the moment.
author.name: Pierre
